altername_name: Spice and Wolf: My Year with Holo
狼与香辛料 - 我与霍罗的一年
name: Ookami to Koushinryou: Boku to Holo no Ichinen
overview: Ookami to Koushinryou: Boku to Horo no Ichinen (or Spice and Wolf: Holo's and My One Year) is a visual novel style game featuring characters from the manga / anime Spice and Wolf.
